meanings.definition: Of or relating to the penis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor discussed the penial health of the patient.
meanings.sent2: The penial anatomy was studied in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The penial jokes at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His penial confidence helped him succeed in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The penial characteristics were carefully examined by the researchers.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a penis.
meanings.sent1: The sculpture had a penial shape that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the penial features in great detail.
meanings.sent3: The penial design of the building raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Her penial humor added a playful touch to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The penial resemblance was uncanny and amusing to the viewers.
